message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested but that's a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  How about $95? That's a fair price for both of us.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I can do $100, but that's as low as I can go.
Alice, I'm really trying to get this deal done.  How about $98? It's a fair price for both of us, and it's closer to my budget.
I'm not going to go any lower than $105, Bob. That's the lowest I can go. If you're willing to meet me at $105, we can make a deal.
Alice, I'm still interested in buying, but I'm not going to go above $99.  If you can meet me there, we have a deal. Otherwise, I may need to look elsewhere.
I'm not willing to go below $110, Bob. That's the absolute lowest I can go. If you're serious about buying, I'm willing to meet you there.
